workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

sprint", "type": "string", "example": "Sprint 1"}, {"name": "sprint_duration", "description": "The duration of the sprint in weeks", "type": "integer", "example": 2}, {"name": "sprint_goals", workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

question: We want to automate a workflow triggered by 'New issue created' events. This workflow should execute specific actions, notify 'DEVU-456' and 'DEVU-123', and maintain an actions log. Can you help set up this workflow?
answer: [{"tool_name": "automate_workflow", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger_event", "value": "New issue created"}, {"name": "workflow_actions", "value": [{"action": "Assign to Appropriate Team"}, {"action": "Send Slack Notification"}]}, {"name": "notifications", "value": ["DEVU-456", "DEVU-123"]}, {"name": "actions_log", "value": true}]}]
